DeviceClass.description: USB device Class code as defined by the USB HID device specification.

DeviceSubClass.description: USB device SubClass code as defined by the USB HID device specification.

DeviceProtocol.description: Protocol code as defined by the USB HID specification.

DeviceCapacityMB.description: USB device usable capacity (if applicable) in Mbytes

DeviceName.description: USB device name in UTF-8 format.

ProductID.description: USB product ID as defined by manufacturer.

Location.description: Location of the USB device on the server

StructuredName.description: USB device structured name in UTF-8 format.

UEFIDevicePath.description: UEFI device path of USB device. Standardized text representation of the UEFI device path, in UTF-8 format

VendorID.description: Vendor ID of detected USB device.

title: #HpeUSBDevice.v2_0_0.HpeUSBDevice
